scripts.build: npx tsc && cp -rf public_html/ dist/ && bash src/scripts/getClusterData.sh
scripts.start: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.start:utils: npx tsc && cd dist/ && node occasionalUtils.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && cd dist/ && node bots/heartbeat/index.js --debug
scripts.restart: npm run build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js
